result.markdown:
---
title: "Performance Measures"
author: "Gani Cem Türemen"
---


# Challenge Summary

For the challenge, we will continue working on the Product Backorders dataset. The goal here is to visualize various performance metrics of H2O models to simplify evaluation of them.

# Objectives

Apply your learning of H2O Automated Machine Learning to predict backorder status and visualize performance metrics to evaluate models.

# Solution

## Import Libraries


::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_d98d3c219efbbbc61564abc925bc85e8'}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(rsample)
library(h2o)
library(recipes)
library(cowplot)
library(glue)
```
:::


## Load the training & test dataset


::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_c09413e5328f6766b6a45d795889b268'}

```{.r .cell-code}
product_backorders_tbl <- read_csv("data/product_backorders.csv")

product_backorders_tbl %>% glimpse()
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_88219ec31f74a06191d1e95572947cfe'}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

#> $ went_on_backorder <chr> "Yes", "Yes", "Yes", "Yes", "Yes", "Yes", "Yes", "Ye…
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_1d285e883fa3acb237edefbd406a2538'}

```{.r .cell-code}
set.seed(seed = 777)
split_obj <- initial_split(product_backorders_tbl, prop = 0.80)

train_set_tbl <- training(split_obj)
test_set_tbl  <- testing(split_obj)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_d2e7380d8ba3b0d54f27e94174f418c2'}

```{.r .cell-code}
recipe_obj <- recipe(went_on_backorder ~., data = train_set_tbl) %>% 
  step_zv(all_predictors()) %>% 
  step_mutate_at(potential_issue,
                 deck_risk,
                 oe_constraint,
                 ppap_risk,
                 stop_auto_buy,
                 rev_stop,
                 went_on_backorder,
                 fn = as.factor) %>% 
  prep()

train_tbl <- bake(recipe_obj, new_data = train_set_tbl)
test_tbl  <- bake(recipe_obj, new_data = test_set_tbl)

train_tbl %>% glimpse()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

#> $ went_on_backorder <fct> No, No, Yes, No, No, No, No, No, No, No, No, Yes, No…
```
:::
:::


## Specify the response and predictor variables


::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_26762db09980bba87a3ee5216a3226cf'}

```{.r .cell-code}
h2o.init()

split_h2o <- h2o.splitFrame(as.h2o(train_tbl), ratios = c(0.80), seed = 767)
train_h2o <- split_h2o[[1]]
valid_h2o <- split_h2o[[2]]
test_h2o  <- as.h2o(test_tbl)

y <- "went_on_backorder"
x <- setdiff(names(train_h2o), y)
```
:::

    
## Run AutoML specifying the stopping criterion


::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_c363991dde88324ae735e8b58651fab6'}

```{.r .cell-code}
automl_models_h2o <- h2o.automl(
  x = x,
  y = y,
  training_frame    = train_h2o,
  validation_frame  = valid_h2o,
  leaderboard_frame = test_h2o,
  max_runtime_secs  = 60,
  nfolds            = 5 
)
```
:::


## View the leaderboard


::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_c1556bfaf53b0454fe10563a63287890'}

```{.r .cell-code}
automl_models_h2o@leaderboard
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

```
:::
:::


## Leaderboard visualization


::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-9_04d69b7ffbb54bdfc17a3a02286415f0'}

```{.r .cell-code}
model_leaderboard <- automl_models_h2o@leaderboard %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  select(-c(aucpr, mean_per_class_error, rmse, mse)) %>%
  mutate(model_type = str_extract(model_id, "[^_]+")) %>%
  rownames_to_column(var = "row_name") %>%
  mutate(model_id   = as_factor(model_id) %>% reorder(auc), 
         model_type = as.factor(model_type)
  ) %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = -c(model_id, model_type, row_name), 
               names_to = "key", 
               values_to = "value", 
               names_transform = list(key = forcats::fct_inorder)
  ) %>% 
  mutate(model_id = paste0(row_name, ". ", model_id) %>% as_factor() %>% fct_rev())

model_leaderboard %>%
  ggplot(aes(value, model_id, color = model_type)) +
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  geom_label(aes(label = round(value, 2), hjust = "inward")) +
  
  # Facet to break out logloss and auc
  facet_wrap(~ key, scales = "free_x") +
  labs(title = "Leaderboard Metrics",
       subtitle = paste0("Ordered by: ", "auc"),
       y = "Model Position, Model ID", x = "") + 
  theme(
    legend.position = "bottom",
    legend.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222", color = "white"),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222"),
    panel.border = element_rect(color = "white", fill = NA),
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222"),
    line = element_line(color = "white"),
    text = element_text(color = "white"),
    axis.ticks = element_line(color = "white"),
    axis.text = element_text(color = "white")
  )
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](05_performance_measures_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Tune a model with grid search




::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-11_5612e9387ac78b815178b75a1aebe73d'}

```{.r .cell-code}
model <- automl_models_h2o@leaderboard %>% 
  extract_h2o_model_name_by_position(9) %>% 
  h2o.getModel()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
#> GLM_1_AutoML_1_20230604_130304
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-12_1df8398d3ec971dab528a83170ab2e66'}

```{.r .cell-code}
p_model <- h2o.performance(model, newdata = as.h2o(test_tbl))

p_model
```
:::

:::

::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-14_0c9ef3d05e8e44a4aabb3e03d3144d96'}

```{.r .cell-code}
model_grid <- h2o.grid(
  algorithm = "glm",
  grid_id = "model_grid",
  x = x,
  y = y,
  training_frame = train_h2o,
  validation_frame = valid_h2o,
  nfolds = 5,
  hyper_params = list(
    alpha = c(0, 0.25, 0.50, 0.75, 1.00),
    lambda = c(0, 0.01, 0.1, 1, 10)
  )
)
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-15_501ea43d5f3dc75bdeaaf7247871cdb2'}

```{.r .cell-code}
h2o.getGrid(grid_id = "model_grid", sort_by = "auc", decreasing = TRUE)
```

## Visualize the trade-off between the precision and the recall and the optimal threshold


::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-19_846f07275d3f461f3d1b8519f5d18efc'}

```{.r .cell-code}
p_model_grid_5_tbl <- p_model_grid_5 %>% 
  h2o.metric() %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  mutate(auc = h2o.auc(p_model_grid_5))

p_model_grid_5_tbl %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = threshold)) +
  geom_line(aes(y = precision), color = "#2DC6D6", size = 1) +
  geom_line(aes(y = recall), color = "#FF8014", size = 1) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = h2o.find_threshold_by_max_metric(p_model_grid_5, "f1"), 
             color = "red") +
  labs(title = "Precision vs Recall", y = "value") +
  theme(
    legend.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222", color = "white"),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222"),
    panel.border = element_rect(color = "white", fill = NA),
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222"),
    line = element_line(color = "white"),
    text = element_text(color = "white"),
    axis.ticks = element_line(color = "white"),
    axis.text = element_text(color = "white")
  )
```
:::

::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-20_e31c53def76dd468cee0a2bc26f8bb6c'}
::: {.cell-output-display}
![](05_performance_measures_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-20-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## ROC Plot


::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-21_341ff3ca6674055ff1ef6a3bc864723d'}

```{.r .cell-code}
roc_plot <- p_model_grid_5_tbl %>% 
  mutate(auc  = auc %>% round(3) %>% as.character() %>% as_factor()) %>%
  ggplot(aes(fpr, tpr, linetype = auc)) +
  geom_line(color = "#2DC6D6", size = 1) +
  geom_abline(color = "#FF8014", linetype = "dotted") +
  labs(title = "ROC Plot", subtitle = "-") +
  theme(
    legend.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222", color = "white"),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222"),
    panel.border = element_rect(color = "white", fill = NA),
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222"),
    line = element_line(color = "white"),
    text = element_text(color = "white"),
    axis.ticks = element_line(color = "white"),
    axis.text = element_text(color = "white")
  )

roc_plot
```

## Precision vs Recall Plot


::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-22_bd827abb9a5109ffcfb59b5286e7ed68'}

```{.r .cell-code}
pr_plot <- p_model_grid_5_tbl %>%
  mutate(auc  = auc %>% round(3) %>% as.character() %>% as_factor()) %>%
  ggplot(aes(recall, precision, linetype = auc)) +
  geom_line(color = "#2DC6D6", size = 1) +
  labs(title = "Precision vs Recall Plot", subtitle = "-") +
  theme(
    legend.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222", color = "white"),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222"),
    panel.border = element_rect(color = "white", fill = NA),
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222"),
    line = element_line(color = "white"),
    text = element_text(color = "white"),
    axis.ticks = element_line(color = "white"),
    axis.text = element_text(color = "white")
  )

pr_plot
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](05_performance_measures_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-22-1.png){width=672}
:::

## Gain Plot


::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-23_e3c3b730fa9f34f6aeddaef2e02750d2'}

```{.r .cell-code}
gain_lift_tbl <- p_model_grid_5 %>%
  h2o.gainsLift() %>%
  as_tibble()

gain_transformed_tbl <- gain_lift_tbl %>% 
  select(group, cumulative_data_fraction, cumulative_capture_rate, cumulative_lift) %>%
  select(-contains("lift")) %>%
  mutate(baseline = cumulative_data_fraction) %>%
  rename(gain     = cumulative_capture_rate) %>%
  # prepare the data for the plotting (for the color and group aesthetics)
  pivot_longer(cols = c(gain, baseline), values_to = "value", names_to = "key")

gain_plot <- gain_transformed_tbl %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = cumulative_data_fraction, y = value, color = key)) +
  geom_line(size = 1.5) +
  labs(title = "Gain Chart", x = "Cumulative Data Fraction", y = "Gain") +
  theme(
    legend.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222", color = "white"),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222"),
    panel.border = element_rect(color = "white", fill = NA),
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222"),
    line = element_line(color = "white"),
    text = element_text(color = "white"),
    axis.ticks = element_line(color = "white"),
    axis.text = element_text(color = "white")
  )

gain_plot
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](05_performance_measures_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-23-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


## Lift Plot


::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-24_d34442d3d11fd3051cf1a7d5e31adbcf'}

```{.r .cell-code}
lift_transformed_tbl <- gain_lift_tbl %>% 
  select(group, cumulative_data_fraction, cumulative_capture_rate, cumulative_lift) %>%
  select(-contains("capture")) %>%
  mutate(baseline = 1) %>%
  rename(lift = cumulative_lift) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(lift, baseline), values_to = "value", names_to = "key")

lift_plot <- lift_transformed_tbl %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = cumulative_data_fraction, y = value, color = key)) +
  geom_line(size = 1.5) +
  labs(title = "Lift Chart", x = "Cumulative Data Fraction", y = "Lift") +
  theme(
    legend.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222", color = "white"),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222"),
    panel.border = element_rect(color = "white", fill = NA),
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222"),
    line = element_line(color = "white"),
    text = element_text(color = "white"),
    axis.ticks = element_line(color = "white"),
    axis.text = element_text(color = "white")
  )

lift_plot
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](05_performance_measures_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-24-1.png){width=672}
:::

## Dashboard with cowplot


::: {.cell hash='05_performance_measures_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-25_845ecbc9f3ee2298c7a5a4e1ce03edea'}

```{.r .cell-code}
p_legend <- get_legend(roc_plot)

roc_plot <- roc_plot + theme(legend.position = "none")

p <- plot_grid(roc_plot, pr_plot, gain_plot, lift_plot, ncol = 2)

p_title <- ggdraw() + 
  draw_label("H2O Model Metrics", size = 18, fontface = "bold", color = "white")
  
p_subtitle <- ggdraw() + draw_label(glue("-"), size = 10, color = "white")
  
combined_plot <- plot_grid(p_title, 
                           p_subtitle, 
                           p, 
                           p_legend, 
                           ncol = 1, 
                           rel_heights = c(0.05, 0.05, 1, 0.05 * 4)) +
  theme(
    legend.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222", color = "white"),
    panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222"),
    panel.border = element_rect(color = "white", fill = NA),
    plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#222222"),
    line = element_line(color = "white"),
    text = element_text(color = "white"),
    axis.ticks = element_line(color = "white"),
    axis.text = element_text(color = "white")
  )

combined_plot
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](05_performance_measures_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-25-1.png){width=672}
:::
